## ğŸ“‹ Daily Breakdown

### Day 1: URL Normalization
- [ ] URL canonicalization (http/https, www, trailing slash)
- [ ] URL deduplication database

### Day 2: Content-Based Dedup (Simhash)
- [ ] Implement simhash algorithm
- [ ] Generate document fingerprints
- [ ] Hamming distance calculation
- [ ] Near-duplicate detection

### Day 3: Shingles & Integration
- [ ] Implement shingling algorithm
- [ ] Combine simhash + shingles
- [ ] Integration with index builder
- [ ] Test with real duplicates

### Day 4: Performance & Testing
- [ ] Optimize for scale (100M docs)
- [ ] Batch deduplication pipeline
- [ ] Comprehensive tests
- [ ] Impact measurement
